                            Professional Education at Brown
                        












Pause/Play this video











  Our Programs


  Rigorous. Supportive. Collaborative. Our student-centered programs are carefully curated to fuel intellectual curiosity, career transformation and real-world impact.






  Our Mission


  To leverage the University’s excellence in liberal arts, interdisciplinary study, critical thinking and cutting-edge research to forge 21st century professionals.






  Request Information


  Stay connected! Join our mailing list for updates and to learn more about Brown’s professional programs.

  A Letter from the Dean



  Shankar Prasad, Dean of the School of Professional Studies and Vice President of Academic Innovation at Brown University reflects on highlights from his first 100 days and plans for the year ahead.


Read Letter


























  The Brown University Difference



  Our commitment to educational innovation, diversity and inclusion, collaboration and making an impact in the world is at the core of what we do.


Learn More


























  Hear from our Ambassadors



  Learn more about our students and alumni — and why they chose Brown — to help inform your decision to apply.


Read Profiles




















  Professional Programs


  Now more than ever, you need a broad vision and ability to innovate to address complex global and industry-specific challenges. Brown’s professional education programs are designed to break down silos and integrate a diversity of perspectives to bring new ideas forward.
